wines.name: Screaming Eagle
wines.description: A cult Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon known for its power and finesse. Intense flavors of blackberry, cassis, and mocha with velvety tannins.
wines.food_pairing: Best enjoyed with grilled ribeye, beef Wellington, or aged Gouda cheese.

wines.name: Château d'Yquem
wines.description: The ultimate Sauternes wine, revered for its honeyed sweetness and complexity. Luscious flavors of apricot, honey, and botrytis with vibrant acidity.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs perfectly with foie gras, blue cheese, or peach cobbler.

wines.name: Sine Qua Non Syrah
wines.description: An exceptional California Syrah with intense fruit flavors and a velvety texture. Notes of blackberry, blueberry, and smoked meat.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with grilled lamb chops, beef brisket, or blue cheese burgers.

wines.name: Château Lafite Rothschild
wines.description: A legendary Bordeaux wine known for its finesse and complexity. Notes of cassis, cedar, and graphite with silky tannins.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs well with roast lamb, beef tenderloin, or aged cheeses.

wines.name: Château Margaux
wines.description: An iconic Bordeaux wine with a refined and elegant character. Layers of blackcurrant, violet, and cedar with polished tannins.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs wonderfully with roast beef, lamb chops, or duck confit.

wines.name: Penfolds Grange
wines.description: Australia's most famous wine, crafted from Shiraz grapes. Opulent and full-bodied with flavors of dark plum, licorice, and vanilla.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with slow-roasted lamb, beef brisket, or aged cheddar.

wines.name: Sassicaia
wines.description: An iconic Super Tuscan wine with remarkable elegance and finesse. Layers of black cherry, tobacco, and leather with silky tannins.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs well with osso buco, wild boar ragù, or Pecorino cheese.

wines.name: Bollinger RD
wines.description: A prestigious Champagne known for its richness and complexity. Toasty aromas of brioche, hazelnut, and citrus with fine bubbles.
wines.food_pairing: Perfect as an aperitif or paired with oysters, caviar, or smoked salmon.

wines.name: Masseto
wines.description: A legendary Italian wine crafted from Merlot grapes. Concentrated and velvety with intense flavors of blackberry, plum, and chocolate.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with grilled ribeye steak, braised short ribs, or aged Parmigiano-Reggiano.

wines.name: Dom Pérignon
wines.description: A prestigious Champagne synonymous with luxury and celebration. Delicate bubbles with aromas of white flowers, citrus, and toasted almond.
wines.food_pairing: Ideal as an aperitif or paired with seafood, sushi, or lobster.

wines.name: La Tâche Grand Cru
wines.description: An iconic Burgundy wine known for its finesse and complexity. Elegant aromas of red fruit, truffle, and earth with silky tannins.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with roasted game birds, wild mushroom risotto, or aged Gruyère cheese.

wines.name: Clos Apalta
wines.description: A premium Chilean wine blending Bordeaux varietals. Rich and concentrated with flavors of blackberry, plum, and dark chocolate.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs well with grilled steak, lamb chops, or empanadas.

wines.name: Château Pétrus
wines.description: An iconic Bordeaux wine with a cult following. Opulent and powerful with aromas of black cherry, truffle, and tobacco.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with roasted duck, filet mignon, or aged Gouda cheese.

wines.name: Domaine Leroy Musigny Grand Cru
wines.description: A prestigious Burgundy wine crafted with meticulous care. Complex aromas of cherry, rose petal, and forest floor with a silky texture.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs well with roasted duck breast, wild mushroom risotto, or aged Gruyère cheese.

wines.name: Krug Grand Cuvée
wines.description: An exquisite Champagne crafted from a blend of reserve wines. Rich and complex with flavors of toasted bread, honey, and stone fruit.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with caviar, lobster, or creamy cheeses.

wines.name: Domaine de la Romanée-Conti Romanée-Conti Grand Cru
wines.description: One of the most sought-after and expensive wines in the world. Intensely aromatic with flavors of ripe cherry, truffle, and spice.
wines.food_pairing: Ideal with seared duck breast, wild mushroom risotto, or coq au vin.
wines.awards: 100 points from Robert Parker's Wine Advocate

wines.name: Penfolds Bin 389 Cabernet Shiraz
wines.description: A classic Australian blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Shiraz. Full-bodied and rich with flavors of blackcurrant, plum, and chocolate.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs well with grilled steak, barbecue ribs, or aged cheddar.

wines.name: Domaine de la Romanée-Conti Montrachet Grand Cru
wines.description: An exceptional Burgundy white wine with intense aromas of citrus, pear, and hazelnut. Rich and opulent with vibrant acidity.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with seared scallops, lobster thermidor, or creamy risotto.

wines.name: Domaine Leflaive Montrachet Grand Cru
wines.description: An iconic Burgundy white wine with exquisite purity and elegance. Aromas of white flowers, lemon zest, and minerality with a silky texture.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs well with grilled lobster, chicken in cream sauce, or aged Gruyère cheese.

wines.name: Catena Zapata Adrianna Vineyard Malbec
wines.description: An exceptional Malbec showcasing Argentina's high-altitude terroir. Intense flavors of blackberry, plum, and violet with velvety tannins.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with grilled ribeye steak, empanadas, or dark chocolate desserts.

wines.name: Opus One
wines.description: A Bordeaux-style blend crafted from Napa Valley's finest grapes. Rich and opulent with layers of dark fruit, chocolate, and spice.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs beautifully with grilled ribeye steak, venison stew, or dark chocolate desserts.

wines.name: Almaviva
wines.description: A collaborative venture between Baron Philippe de Rothschild and Concha y Toro. A Bordeaux-style blend with elegance and structure.
wines.food_pairing: Pairs well with grilled lamb chops, beef Wellington, or aged Gouda cheese.
